pr_title: Add a native extension for AWS2-SQS

timeline.message: Add a native extension for AWS2-SQS
Added extension to pom.xml and format

timeline.bodyText: BTW there is Stream.toArray() that can save the List to array conversion in the next statement.
timeline.author: ppalaga

timeline.bodyText: Hm... is constructor and methods reflection really necessary for java.lang.String? Sounds possible, but rather strange. I wonder who is the caller in that reflective access?
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: I don't know what I pasted here, I have to double check where the Class.forName is done, but without the declaration for String, SQS doesn't work.
replies.author: oscerd

timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: I'm sending a PR for AWS2-S3, I'll fix this in a subsequent PR
replies.author: oscerd

timeline.bodyText: I do not think @RegisterForReflection is necessary here
timeline.author: ppalaga
